statements: SELECT * FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates;
SELECT client_name, version FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates;
SELECT id, client_name, version, release_date FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates;
SELECT * FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates WHERE client_name = 'Cisco';
SELECT id, version, release_date FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT id, client_name, version, release_date FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates WHERE client_name = 'OpenVPN' ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT * FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates WHERE version LIKE '%2.0%' ORDER BY id
SELECT client_name, COUNT(*) as total_updates FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates GROUP BY client_name ORDER BY total_updates DESC
SELECT id, client_name, version, update_url FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates WHERE release_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY version
SELECT client_name, MAX(release_date) as latest_update_date FROM VPN_Client_Software_Updates GROUP BY client_name ORDER BY latest_update_date DESC
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients;
SELECT client_name, last_updated FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, release_date FROM patches;
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT client_name, client_version, last_updated FROM vpn_clients WHERE last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_version FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_id = 2;
SELECT patch_name, release_date FROM patches WHERE patch_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT client_name, patch_name FROM vpn_clients, patches WHERE vpn_clients.client_id = patches.patch_id;
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_id > 100;
SELECT * FROM software_updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, client_name, last_connection FROM vpn_clients WHERE last_connection IS NOT NULL;
SELECT u.update_version, p.patch_version FROM software_updates u INNER JOIN patches p ON u.update_id = p.update_id;
SELECT client_name, last_connection FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM software_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT client_name, last_connection FROM vpn_clients WHERE last_connection >= '2021-10-01';
SELECT patch_description, patch_version FROM patches WHERE update_id = 3;
SELECT client_name, last_connection, update_version FROM vpn_clients JOIN software_updates ON vpn_clients.client_id = software_updates.update_id;
SELECT * FROM vpn_clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM vpn_clients ORDER BY client_name DESC;
SELECT update_id, update_name FROM updates WHERE update_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_version FROM vpn_clients WHERE client_version LIKE '%2.0%';
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_name LIKE '%security%' ORDER BY release_date ASC;
SELECT client_id, client_name, client_version FROM vpn_clients;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT client_name, update_name, update_date FROM vpn_clients JOIN clients_updates ON vpn_clients.client_id = clients_updates.client_id JOIN updates ON clients_updates.update_id = updates.update_id;

SELECT client_name, patch_name, release_date FROM vpn_clients JOIN clients_updates ON vpn_clients.client_id = clients_updates.client_id JOIN updates ON clients_updates.update_id = updates.update_id JOIN patches ON updates.update_id = patches.patch_id;
SELECT client_id, client_name, last_updated FROM vpn_clients WHERE last_updated BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients;
SELECT client_id, client_name FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_version FROM clients ORDER BY client_version DESC;
SELECT update_name, update_version, update_date FROM updates WHERE update_id > 5;
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM clients WHERE client_id = 1;
SELECT client_name, client_version FROM clients ORDER BY last_update DESC;
SELECT update_name, update_version, update_date FROM updates WHERE update_version LIKE '1.%';
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT c.client_name, u.update_name, p.patch_name FROM clients c INNER JOIN clients_updates cu ON c.client_id = cu.client_id INNER JOIN updates u ON cu.update_id = u.update_id INNER JOIN updates_patches up ON u.update_id = up.update_id INNER JOIN patches p ON up.patch_id = p.patch_id ORDER BY c.client_name ASC, u.update_name DESC, p.patch_date ASC;
